metadata.description: The Ubuntu version for the VM. This will pick a fully patched image of this given Ubuntu version. Allowed values: 14.04.5-LTS, 16.04.0-LTS, 18.04-LTS.
Type of authentication to use on the Virtual Machine. SSH key is default, and recommended.
SSH Key or password for the Virtual Machine. SSH key is recommended.
The base URI where artifacts required by this template are located.
IP CIDR Block for server management using SSH.
Name of the public IP address for the webserver
